Name: Pretty Bow
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Igglybuff, Jigglypuff, and Wigglytuff.  You can get a Pretty Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Iggly-Dew, an Iggly-Card, and a Bouncy Charm. That's the easy way! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
